blocks.name: df-pstm
blocks.content: Define the metric induced by a pseudometric. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)

axiom df-pstm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cpstm, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cpsmet)), cmpo(s1, s2, cqs(cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cmetid, cv(s0))), cqs(cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cmetid, cv(s0))), cuni(cab(s3, wrex(s4, cv(s1), wrex(s5, cv(s2), wceq(cv(s3), co(cv(s4), cv(s0), cv(s5))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pstm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ pstoMet =(s0 ∈ ⋃ ran(PsMet)↦(s1 ∈(dom(dom(s0))/.(~Met ` s0)), s2 ∈(dom(dom(s0))/.(~Met ` s0))↦ ⋃ { s3 | ∃(s4 ∈ s1, ∃(s5 ∈ s2, s3 =(s4[s0]s5)))}))
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
}

  df-metid(hs0, s0, s1)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0)))
  anbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0))
  anbi12d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqtr4d(cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c1, cdm(cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))

  psmetdmdm(c0, c1)
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cpsmet))), wrex(s0, cdm(cpsmet), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, cv(s0)))))
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wrex(s0, cdm(cpsmet), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, cdm(cpsmet)))

  funmpt2(s0, cpsmet, universe, crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), nat0), wral(hs1, cv(s0), wral(hs2, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cle, co(co(cv(hs2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cxad, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))))))
  df-psmet(s0, hs0, s1, hs1, hs2)

  opabssxp(s0, s1, c1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0))
  xpexd(c1, c1, universe, universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  elfvex(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  ssexg(copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0))), cxp(c1, c1), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), nat0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(cpsmet)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs2)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
}

thm metidval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)→(~Met ` c0)= { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧(s0[c0]s1)= 0)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, cmetid, c0, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧(s0[c0]s1)= 0)}, ⋃ ran(PsMet), { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)))∧(s0[hs0]s1)= 0)}, universe, c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1))
  a1i(c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), ~Met =(hs0 ∈ ⋃ ran(PsMet)↦ { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)))∧(s0[hs0]s1)= 0)}))
  df-metid(hs0, s0, s1)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0), ((s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)))∧(s0[hs0]s1)= 0), ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧(s0[c0]s1)= 0))
  anbi12d((c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0), (s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))∧ s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0))), (s0[hs0]s1)= 0, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), (s0[c0]s1)= 0)
  anbi12d((c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0), s0 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), s1 ∈ dom(dom(hs0)), s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1)
  eleq2d(s0, dom(dom(hs0)), c1, (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0))
  eleq2d(s1, dom(dom(hs0)), c1, (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0))
  eqtr4d(dom(dom(hs0)), c1, dom(dom(c0)), (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0))
  dmeqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0))
  dmeqd(hs0, c0, (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0))
  adantr(c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0, c1 = dom(dom(c0)))
  psmetdmdm(c0, c1)
  eqeq1d((s0[hs0]s1), nat0, (s0[c0]s1), (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0))
  oveqd(s0, hs0, s1, c0, (c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧ hs0 = c0))
  simpr(c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  sylibr(c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(PsMet), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(PsMet), c0 ∈(PsMet ` s0)))
  mpancom(c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(PsMet), c0 ∈(PsMet ` s0)), c1 ∈ dom(PsMet))
  elfvdm(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  rspcev(s0, c1, dom(PsMet), c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), c0 ∈(PsMet ` s0))
  eleq2d(c0, (PsMet ` s0), (PsMet ` c1), s0 = c1)
  fveq2(s0, c1, cpsmet)
  ax-mp((c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(PsMet)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(PsMet), c0 ∈(PsMet ` s0))), Fun(PsMet))
  funmpt2(s0, cpsmet, universe, { hs0 ∈(ℝ*[↦](s0 × s0))| ∀(s1 ∈ s0,((s1[hs0]s1)= 0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ s0, ∀(hs2 ∈ s0,(s1[hs0]hs1)[≤]((hs2[hs0]s1)[+](hs2[hs0]hs1))))))})
  df-psmet(s0, hs0, s1, hs1, hs2)
  elunirn(s0, cpsmet, c0)
  sylancr(c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧(s0[c0]s1)= 0)} ∈ 𝕌, { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧(s0[c0]s1)= 0)} ⊆(c1 × c1), (c1 × c1)∈ 𝕌)
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c1, c1, (s0[c0]s1)= 0)
  xpexd(c1, c1, universe, universe, c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1))
  elfvex(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  ssexg({ < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧(s0[c0]s1)= 0)}, (c1 × c1), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧(s0[c0]s1)= 0)})
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ ran(PsMet))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cpsmet)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: metidss
blocks.content: As a relation, the metric identification is a subset of a Cartesian product. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: metidv
blocks.content: ` A ` and ` B ` identify by the metric ` D ` if their distance is zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)

thm metidv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wb(wbr(c2, cfv(cmetid, c0), c3), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0)))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, cfv(cmetid, c0), c3), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0), wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0))), c3), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wb(wbr(c2, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0))), c3), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0))))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3, c1, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0))), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0)))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0))
  bi2anan9(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c3, c1)
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0, co(c2, c0, c3), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1), c3, c0)
  eqid(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0))))
  breqd(c2, cfv(cmetid, c0), c3, copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmetid, c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat0)))))
  metidval(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wb(wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0))))
  ibar(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(c2, c0, c3), nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

thm metidv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(PsMet ` c1)∧(c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))→(c2[(~Met ` c0)]c3 ↔(c2[c0]c3)= 0))
} = {

blocks.name: pstmxmet
blocks.content: The metric induced by a pseudometric is a full-fledged metric on the equivalence classes of the metric identification. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
